Activity.ActivityName: Open Ginger & Download SVN Test solution

ActWindowsControl.Description: Click on the solution drop down
click on search text box and enter 'Test'

ActSwitchWindow.Description: Switch Window to Download solution message

ActWindowsControl.Description: Click on 'Yes' of 'Do you want to open downloaded solution' message

ActSwitchWindow.Description: Switch Window Action to Ok message

ActWindowsControl.Description: Go to Automate tab of the Business Flow

Activity.ActivityName: Open the Solution

ActWindowsControl.LocateValue: /Select Ginger Solution Folder/[LocalizedControlType:pane[0]]/Explorer Pane/Folder Layout Pane/Control Host/Namespace Tree Control/Desktop/This PC/System (C:)

Activity.ActivityName: Value Expression- Global Variables-Testing & Validation

ActWindowsControl.Description: Click on the Add Action button
Click on General Actions tab of 'Add Action' wizard

ActWindowsControl.LocateValue: /GenericWindow/[AutomationId:WindowScrollViewer]/[AutomationId:PageFrame AID]/[AutomationId:ActionsTabs]/System.Windows.Controls.TabItem Header: Content:[1]/[AutomationId:GeneralActionsGrid]/[AutomationId:grdMain]/Set Variable Action/Set Variable Action/Set Variable Action

ActWindowsControl.Description: Select 'Set variable operation type' to Set value
Click on Value Expression button near 'Value'
click on Test Value Expression button
Validate the value in Value Expression window
Click on Ok button of the Value expression window
Click on Ok button of the Action window
